item.title: Analysing tweets from the Virtual Madrid Open
item.description: With the world in lockdown and no live tennis in the horizon in the near future the Madrid Open decided to organise an online tournament with male and female players facing each other using the Tennis World Tour video game. I was curious to see how fans reacted to the event. I downloaded twitter data using the rtweet package. I tried to include as many relevant terms as possible, the command I used was: search_tweets2(q="
